profiel.title: About me
profiel.profielText: I'm a motivated web developer eager to expand my knowledge. I'm looking for an interesting workplace, that encourages and supports my professional development. My future aspirations revolve around further strengthening my expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies.

experience.title: Experience
list: Collaborated as a key team member in the development and maintenance of web applications using the Laravel PHP framework, ensuring robust back-end functionality.
Conducted thorough testing, debugging, and optimization to ensure websites and in-house applications were fast-loading, and cross-browser compatible.
Employed Git for version control and participated in agile development processes, including sprint planning and daily stand-up meetings.
Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services for websites and in-house applications.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate design mockups into pixel-perfect web interfaces and mobile app screens.
Gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript while gradually taking on more complex tasks.
mezelf vertrouwd gemaakt met de basisprincipes van populaire php en javascript frameworks
Acquired knowledge of web development best practices and coding standards.
